name: K-Pop Puzzle Idols: Music Festival
summary: Enjoy this puzzle game featuring K-POP-inspired characters! Unlock idols and relax with a music gallery full of K-POP songs. Rhythm, style, and fun!

name: K-pop Idols Dating: Anime Love for PinkOrbil T.
K-Pop Idol Stories: Road to Debut
summary: A love letter to the thrilling world of K-pop! In this life simulator, you're the manager responsible for scouting talent, organising schedules, creating budgets, planning social media, choosing music, and styling your idols. Your goal? To debut the next big K-pop idol group!

name: KPatience
summary: KPatience (executable kpat) is a all-in-one solitaire card games package made using the KDE libraries. It offers different patience-requiring solitaire games. It supports card deck themes and game themes and it has card animations if/when you win. KPatience comes with a very in-depth handbook which explains how to play the included solitaire games in case you never heard of them before.

name: K-pop Idols Dating: Anime Love for B.SeveT
summary: Conquer the Hearts of Future K-pop Stars in 30 Days!

name: Kpop Piano Game: Color Tiles
summary: Play Kpop music on the piano and train your reaction. More fun if it is played together with friends.

name: K-Point Ski Jumping
summary: K-Point Ski jumping is as the title says, 2D Ski jumping game. 34 Real Life based hills Career mode Physics based Mouse controls Online Hill...

name: K-Pop!
summary: Become the ultimate manager of tomorrow's superstars with "K-Pop!", an addictive clicker game created by stans for stans! Gather billions of fans, unlock idols at every milestone, compare your score with your friends and become the ultimate k-pop manager.

name: K-POP Idol Producer
summary: You will become a producer for a new idol group and manage the company and produce your idol.

name: K-Pop Academy
summary: Get ready to embark on a dazzling journey in the world of K-Pop Academy, where your dream of building the ultimate K-pop sensation comes true! Immerse yourself in the charming world of adorable idols, where you take charge of their daily lives and guide them to stardom.

name: K-Pop VR
summary:
Meet world's first dancing digital human in a virtual world. 
'K-pop Dance in VR' is a teaser video of a VR experience where a digital celebrity dancing along her song in front of you.

name: K-Pop Dance Festival
summary: A 'Just Dance' inspired music/rhythm game for the Wii focusing on K-Pop music, released exclusively in South Korea.

name: K-Pop & Rock Band Manager
summary: A new star is born! Favour Toys B.V. Entertainment wants to release a new 4-member Band. You have to choose the trainees who you think are ready to make their debut to the public and make a new history. How you manage the band will determine their future.

name: Kpop Idol Simulator
summary: Kpop Idol Simulator is a simple Kpop simulation game. You can train your character to see what it is going to be after 60 game days. You can collect multiple different ending as how you train your character. Also, you can collect other sundae's items and decorate your room.

name: KPOP Story: Idol Manager
summary: Welcome to the world of KPOP Story! Travel throughout South Korea to recruit talented idols, form idol groups, and top the music charts. Turn trainees into top level celebrities! Create all star groups and see your groups' music alongside the likes of parodies of BTS, EXO, and Red Velvet on the music charts!*
